Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       The snow bank turned into a miniture snow storm with the discharge of 
the Nightmares weapons. Taking this into account, Hell Beast ducked as the 
shots whizzed past his head. Poking up, he shot an optic blast at one of his 
opponants, while sneding a spitfire of plasma at the other.

       Gremlin fell back, hit in the shoulder. His armor dented, he got back 
onto his knees, aimed his cannon at the two Nightmares, and sent a large 
discharge at them, hoping to send them, and the ground they were standing on, 
blowing away.

--part1_c9.b6ff64e.276ce3f5_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"

Taking this into account, Hell Beast ducked as the <BR>shots whizzed past his head. Poking up, he shot an optic blast at one of his <BR>opponants, while sneding a spitfire of plasma at the other.
<BR>
<BR>       Gremlin fell back, hit in the shoulder. His armor dented, he got back <BR>onto his knees, aimed his cannon at the two Nightmares, and sent a large <BR>discharge at them, hoping to send them, and the ground they were standing on, <BR>blowing away.</B></FONT></HTML>
